title: looks like an interesting book
content:
Does any have this? Or checked it out? Looks pretty cool to me. If anyones has read it I would love to hear what they think. I may buy it.

[http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=P0918](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212025504/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=P0918)
author: jonbruns

comments.content:
I only buy books recommended by Peter Bilak ;-) I’ve not got this one, but I’d say go for it.

Cheers, Si

I have it, like it, buy it!

ChrisL
I don’t have the book, but I’ve checked out [the **e-a-t** website](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212025504/http:/www.e-a-t.org/).
I have it, and I like it, too! I second Chris’s recommendation.
